alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 3:48PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern St. Louis County through 415 PM CDT... At 347 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pike Lake Near Duluth, or 11 miles northwest of Superior, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Superior around 400 PM CDT. City of Rice Lake around 405 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include French River. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
